channel.title: CVE Feed for DIRACGrid -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for DIRACGrid -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-24825|2024-02-08T23:39:28.741Z -- diracgrid -- dirac
item.description: DIRAC is a distributed resource framework. In affected versions any user could get a token that has been requested by another user/agent. This may expose resources to unintended parties. This issue has been addressed in release version 8.0.37. Users are advised to upgrade. There are no known workarounds for this vulnerability.
